svcproc.title: MAF / IAT Sensor (Mass Airflow / Intake Air Temperature)
svcproc.para: The digital MAF/IAT sensor utilizes hot film anemometry to determine the amount of fresh air entering the engine. The MAF/IAT sensor is mounted in the air flow between the intake of the turbocharger and the air filter.

The ECM monitors the IAT signal to control timing and fuel rate during cold starts. The IAT sensor is mounted with the MAF/IAT sensor in the air flow between the intake of the turbocharger and the air filter.
